Title.evidence: To perform a double-blinded randomized study comparing 3 different doses of 5-ALA.

Trial_Design.evidence: Twenty-one patients with suspected malignant glioma were randomly assigned to 0.2, 2, or 20 mg/kg 5-ALA.

Participants.evidence: Twenty-one patients with suspected malignant glioma

Objective.evidence: OBJECTIVE: To perform a double-blinded randomized study comparing 3 different doses of 5-ALA.

Randomisation_Allocation.evidence: Twenty-one patients with suspected malignant glioma were randomly assigned

Number_Randomised.evidence: Twenty-one patients with suspected malignant glioma were randomly assigned

Result_Outcome.evidence: A 10-fold increase in 5-ALA dose (2-20 mg/kg) resulted in a 4-fold increase of fluorescence contrast
